message.content:
I need to identify the net cash flow from operating activities and its component sub-items from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the problem, I can see that the cash flow statement clearly shows "Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities" with a value of -967147.02 on 2024-02-02.

The component sub-items that make up this amount are:
1. Net Profit: 112375.10
2. Depreciation: 115511.91
3. (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable: -321015.98
4. (Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable: -12737.96
5. (Increase) Decrease in Inventory: -8466430.00
6. Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable: 7566370.00
7. Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable: 38779.91

I can verify that these items sum to the Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities:
112375.10 + 115511.91 + (-321015.98) + (-12737.96) + (-8466430.00) + 7566370.00 + 38779.91 = -967147.02

So my solution is:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-967147.02', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '112375.10', 'sub_item value2': '115511.91', 'sub_item value3': '-321015.98', 'sub_item value4': '-12737.96', 'sub_item value5': '-8466430.00', 'sub_item value6': '7566370.00', 'sub_item value7': '38779.91'}}}
```
